description: Introducing the 2025 Warstic Bonesaber Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a speed loaded powerhouse designed for players who want to maximize their performance on the field. The Katana Speed Composite Barrel is made from the highest-grade multi-directional composite, allowing for a faster break-in time and unmatched power output. The patented Pommel Precision Knob provides a pro-style grip that offers superior comfort and control with every swing. The optimized connection piece reduces vibration for a smoother, more comfortable feel on contact, while the Tsuka Max Warrior's Grip offers enhanced cushion and tack for a secure hold. With a Feather Lite Composite Cap for increased durability and dual stamp approval for USA and USSSA sanctioned play, this bat is backed by a 12-month warranty for added peace of mind. Elevate your game with the 2025 Warstic Bonesaber Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 273 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
